Feature_GetDeviceEventTypesWSRequest.description: Request object for retrieving possible event types for a device based on enabled features.

deviceUuid.description: RUUID with optional appended facet information

Feature_GetDeviceEventTypesWSResponse.description: Response object containing possible event types for a device based on enabled features.

eventTypes.description: List of possible event types for the device

Feature_GetDeviceFeaturesListWSRequest.description: Request object for retrieving enabled features for multiple devices in an organization.

deviceUuids.description: List of device UUIDs to retrieve features for

items.description: RUUID with optional appended facet information

Feature_GetDeviceFeaturesListWSResponse.description: Response object containing enabled features for multiple devices in an organization.

featureList.description: List of device features for each requested device

Feature_GetDeviceFeaturesWSRequest.description: Request object for retrieving enabled features for a device.

deviceUuid.description: RUUID with optional appended facet information

Feature_GetDeviceFeaturesWSResponse.description: Response object containing enabled features for a device.

Feature_GetFeatureCompatabilityMatrixWSR.description: Request object for retrieving the feature compatibility matrix.
Response object containing the feature compatibility matrix.

Feature_UpdateDeviceFeaturesWSRequest.description: Request object for updating enabled features for a device.

deviceUuid.description: RUUID with optional appended facet information

additionalProperties.description: Map of device features to their new enabled/disabled status

featureMap.description: Map of device features to their new enabled/disabled status

Feature_UpdateDeviceFeaturesWSResponse.description: Response object for updating enabled features for a device.
